mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(BOARD_NO, USER_NO, USER_NICKNAME, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{userNickname}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: SELECT reply_id AS replyId, board_no AS boardNo, user_no AS userNo, user_nickName AS userNickname, reply_content AS replyContent, reply_input_date AS replyInputDate FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY REPLY_INPUT_DATE ASC

SELECT REPLY_ID AS replyId, BOARD_NO AS boardNo, USER_NO AS userNo, USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, REPLY_CONTENT AS replyContent, REPLY_INPUT_DATE AS replyInputDate FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_ID = #{replyId}
